resources.string: Log in with your Aeries account.
Please type an email and a password.
Email, password, or district is incorrect.
Send a notification when a class is updated
Minutes between each check for new updates
Sends notification when a class is updated
Are you sure you want to log out?
This will try to download the latest data for the gradebook even if no updates were detected.\n\nIf there are any errors in the displayed gradebook, this should fix the issue.
Android version is unsupported. Notifications require Android 5.0
Removes all ads from the app
Unable to connect to Google Play
